entry.title: Loneliness Isn't Just Bad for Your Health---It's Deadly
entry.content: People who report often feeling lonely or being socially isolated are at an increased risk of death from any cause, new research suggests.

entry.title: Israel Says 80,000 People Left Northern Gaza Thursday
entry.content: Israeli troops advanced toward the heart of Gaza City, while Israeli officials said 80,000 residents traveled south Thursday, the largest movement so far in the five days since the humanitarian corridor was opened.
